briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of Different Doses of Indacaterol in Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD)
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-blind, Double-dummy, Placebo-controlled, Parallel-group Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of Different Doses of Indacaterol in Patients With Moderate to Severe Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease, Using Salmeterol as an Active Control
summary: This study compared the 14-day bronchodilator efficacy of indacaterol with that of placebo and salmeterol.

primaryOutcome.measure: Trough Forced Expiratory Volume in 1 Second (FEV1) 24 Hours Post-dose at the End of the Study (Week 2 + 1 Day, Day 15)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: 24 hours post-dose at the end of the study (Week 2 + 1 day, Day 15)
